articles.title: Why K-Pop Stars Need to Keep Speaking Up About Black Lives Matter - Teen Vogue
articles.description: In this op-ed, writer Natasha Mulenga examines the response from K-pop groups to Black Lives Matter in the context of K-pop’s origins in Black culture.
articles.content: Watching videos of police brutality takes a physical, emotional, and mental toll on the Black community in a way that no other community will ever be able to understand. The recent videos of George F… [+3233 chars]
